file.name: no-content-in-204.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
paths:
  /other-pets/{petId}:
    delete:
      responses:
        '204':       # Noncompliant: 204 No Content MUST NOT return anything.
          description: delete pet
          content:
            'application/json':
              schema:
                type: object

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /other-pets/{petId}: delete: parse path: path parameter not specified: "petId"
